HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 119 Kč s DPH pro objednávky pod 999 Kč s DPH. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 999 Kč s DPH.
HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: 39 Kč s DPH u objednávek v hodnotě nižší než 5 000 Kč s DPH

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 349 Kč s DPH pro objednávky pod 999 Kč s DPH. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 999 Kč s DPH.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: 39 Kč s DPH u objednávek v hodnotě nižší než 5 000 Kč s DPH

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop provides home delivery and personal pickup. Home delivery for smaller items is handled by DPD, and for larger/palletized items by TopTrans. Personal pickup is available at a single location in Ostrava.
PRICING: Delivery is free for all orders over 999 Kč with VAT. For orders below this threshold, DPD delivery costs 119 Kč and TopTrans costs 349 Kč. Personal pickup in Ostrava is charged at 99 Kč. Cash on delivery (COD) has a surcharge of 39 Kč for orders under 5,000 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The carrier is automatically selected based on the size of the items (DPD for small, TopTrans for large). Weekend delivery is not available. A carry-up service ('vynáška') can be arranged for an additional fee.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page and is generally clear and easy to understand. It clearly outlines the pricing structure, free shipping threshold, and COD fees. However, it lacks specific information on delivery timeframes and does not offer express delivery, parcel shop, or parcel locker options.
